snippet: The veteran coach Víctor Manuel Vucetich has taken charge of Mexico for its next two World Cup qualifying matches, against Panama and Costa Rica.
abstract: Veteran coach Victor Manuel Vucetich takes charge of Mexico's national soccer team for its next two World Cup qualifying soccer matches, against Panama and Costa Rica, after Jose Manuel de la Torre was fired.
lead_paragraph: The veteran coach Víctor Manuel Vucetich has taken charge of Mexico for its next two World Cup qualifying matches, against Panama and Costa Rica.
